name: Rat
desc: A creature known to carry disease.

name: Green Slime
desc: A slime that has fed on grass.

name: Bat
desc: A monster that hunts in the dark using its echolocation.

name: Spider
desc: An overgrown spider out on the hunt for prey.

name: Fairy
desc: A wild fairy that has grown distrustful of other species in its isolation.

name: Mimic
desc: The monster most well known by adventures

name: Wolf
desc: A lonely wolf who has lost his hunting pack.

name: Goblin
desc: Humanoid beings that are known for their pilfering of adventures.

name: Blue Slime
desc: A slime who lives in puddles.

name: Ghost
desc: The remains of a fallen soldier who still has lingering regrets.

name: Orc
desc: An evolved goblin who has seen many battles.

name: Demon
desc: Demonic being who enjoys causing mischief at the worst possible times!

name: Giant Lizard
desc: Lizards who have lived a long life in the dungeon can grow into great sizes.

name: Crocodile
desc: Crocodiles are very territorial, and you are in its territory.

name: Red Slime
desc: A slime who is hot to the touch.
